# Language Reference Docs

- [Language reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/index.md): Learn more about: Entity SQL language reference

## Calling functions in queries

- [Calling functions in queries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/calling-functions-in-linq-to-entities-queries.md): Use these articles to see how the EntityFunctions and SqlFunctions classes provide access to canonical and database functions as part of the Entity Framework.
- [How to: Call Canonical Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/how-to-call-canonical-functions.md): Learn more about: How to: Call Canonical Functions
- [How to: Call Database Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/how-to-call-database-functions.md): Learn more about: How to: Call Database Functions
- [How to: Call Custom Database Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/how-to-call-custom-database-functions.md): Learn more about: How to: Call Custom Database Functions
- [How to: Call Model-Defined Functions in Queries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/how-to-call-model-defined-functions-in-queries.md): Learn more about: How to: Call Model-Defined Functions in Queries
- [How to: Call Model-Defined Functions as Object Methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/how-to-call-model-defined-functions-as-object-methods.md): Learn more about: How to: Call Model-Defined Functions as Object Methods

## Canonical Functions

- [Canonical Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/canonical-functions.md): Learn more about: Canonical Functions
- [Aggregate Canonical Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/aggregate-canonical-functions.md): Learn more about: Aggregate Canonical Functions
- [Math Canonical Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/math-canonical-functions.md): Learn more about: Math Canonical Functions
- [String Canonical Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/string-canonical-functions.md): Learn more about: String Canonical Functions
- [Date and Time Canonical Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/date-and-time-canonical-functions.md): Learn more about: Date and Time Canonical Functions
- [Bitwise Canonical Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/bitwise-canonical-functions.md): Learn more about: Bitwise Canonical Functions
- [Spatial Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/spatial-functions.md): Learn more about: Spatial Functions
- [Other Canonical Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/other-canonical-functions.md): Learn more about: Other Canonical Functions

## Entity SQL Language

- [Entity SQL Language](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/entity-sql-language.md): Learn more about: Entity SQL Language

## Entity SQL Overview

- [Entity SQL Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/entity-sql-overview.md): Learn more about: Entity SQL Overview

- [Constructing Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/constructing-types-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Constructing Types (Entity SQL)
- [Query Plan Caching](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/query-plan-caching-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Query Plan Caching (Entity SQL)

- [Variables](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/variables-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Variables (Entity SQL)
- [Unsupported Expressions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/unsupported-expressions-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Unsupported expressions
- [Literals](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/literals-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Literals (Entity SQL)
- [Null Literals and Type Inference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/null-literals-and-type-inference-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Null Literals and Type Inference (Entity SQL)
- [Input Character Set](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/input-character-set-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Input Character Set (Entity SQL)
- [Query Expressions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/query-expressions-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Query Expressions (Entity SQL)
- [Operator Precedence](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/operator-precedence-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Operator Precedence (Entity SQL)
- [Paging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/paging-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Paging (Entity SQL)
- [Comparison Semantics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/comparison-semantics-entity-sql.md): Learn more about: Comparison Semantics (Entity SQL)
